title: 108_s1214
content: Family Caregiver Relief Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise and rename the Child Tax Credit as the Family Care Credit. Includes within such credit a $3,000 credit for each qualifying individual for whom an eligible taxpayer is a long-term care provider. Defines eligible expenses as: (1) certain medical care, (2) lodging away from home, (3) adult day care, (4) custodial care, (5) respite care. And (6) other specialized children's services, including day care for children with special needs.
